thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Hackney Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Special weekend
thread.title_full: Special weekend - Review of Premier Inn London Hackney Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Davensair
title: Special weekend
text:
We booked 3 nights as we were going to a wedding, other guests were staying too so a lovely happy place,
Staff were all lovely, good rooms with usual Premier Inn facilities, easy online check in,
Breakfast and evening meals only but as this is so close to the high street there is no shortage of eating places nearby, very close to 2 rail stations and easy to find, go to Dalston station which is over the road, Kingsland station is about 4 minutes walk away only too,
We were on the front of the hotel but no traffic noise at all,
